name: Maractus
author: Dsuke
flavor_text: Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds. They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them a precious food source out in the desert.

abilities.name: Exploding Needles
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon, put 6 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.
